title: 2000년 Bostic 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Bostic. 판결일: 2000-03-29. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Deron Bostic
**판결일**: 2000-03-29
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 270 A.D.2d 969
- 706 N.Y.S.2d 922
- 706 N.Y.S.2d 921

## 판결문 요약


—Judgment unanimously affirmed. Counsel’s motion to be relieved of assignment granted {see, People v Crawford, 71 AD2d 38). (Appeal from Judgment of Supreme Court, Erie County, Wolfgang, J. — Attempted Robbery, 1st Degree.) Present — Green, J. P., Hayes, Wisner, Hurlbutt and Scudder, JJ. (Filed Mar. 13, 2000.)
...
